features.featureTitle: Update the Landing page so the uploaded image at `/assets/3a6059bf59d32f6f27e0496b5424853a.jpg` is used as a full-page background image behind all existing content (not just rendered as an inline image). The background must cover the viewport (CSS cover/center), remain fixed behind the UI layer, and must not break the Yes/No button layout or the evasive behavior of the No button.

Update the Gratitude page so the uploaded image at `/assets/2fe29e3f61a6e53093c503c181238cdc.jpg` is used as a full-page background image behind all existing content. The background must cover the viewport (CSS cover/center) and remain behind the page content without reducing readability or breaking layout.
